headerStory: In a time when antisemitism is once again on the rise, silence is not an option. MagenTravel is a community-powered platform that ensures every Jew can travel safely—anywhere in the world.

features.title: Interactive Map
features.text: A fully interactive map lets you pan, zoom, and explore locations around the world. Your live location is shown as a black Star of David on a blurry yellow background.

features.title: Real-Time Ratings
features.text: Users can rate places, drivers, restaurants, or hotels based on how Jewish-friendly they are, giving you insight before visiting.

features.title: Live Field Reports
features.text: Community-submitted experiences and warnings are instantly available to help inform your travels.

features.title: Location-Based Alerts
features.text: If someone nearby reports danger or antisemitism, you’ll receive an alert with help sources. Alerts appear as a danger icon with a shockwave radius, visible to users within 1km.

features.title: Live Minyan Requests
features.text: Request and join Minyanim in real time. Alerts stay up for 30 minutes or until 10 people confirm participation. You can indicate how many are coming with you.

features.title: Detailed Place Reports
features.text: Add and browse detailed place reports for taxis, restaurants, hotels, homes, and more. Each entry includes an initial review and is timestamped.

features.title: Smart Search
features.text: Search for any detail — name, phone, address, or type — with auto-detection and live suggestions. The map auto-focuses on results, showing detailed info.

features.title: Taxi Directory
features.text: Switch to taxi mode to browse rated taxis by city. Filter by rating or comment. Each taxi has a searchable record with license plate, phone, and more.

features.title: Filter & Explore
features.text: Filter places by category, antisemitism rating, or distance. A distance slider helps you control your discovery radius.

features.title: Community Comments
features.text: Every place and review includes timestamped comments. Reviews are color-coded: green (positive), yellow (neutral), red (negative).

features.title: Dangerous Zones
features.text: Verified dangerous zones appear on the map as overlays. Users can suggest zones which become public once reviewed by the community.

features.title: Emergency Alerts
features.text: Report emergencies using your current location, map point, or address search. Others nearby are notified and can follow live updates.

features.title: Auto Translation
features.text: All content can be automatically translated. Tap to see the original message. Names, addresses, and brand names remain unchanged.

features.title: Mobile First
features.text: The entire platform is fully responsive and optimized for mobile usage on the go.

features.title: Global Lists by Category
features.text: Explore categories like restaurants, hotels, and synagogues near your map center. Filter and sort results by distance or rating.

features.title: Thematic Chats
features.text: Join ephemeral chats for emergencies, Minyanim, and each country. Messages last a week or until the alert/minyan ends. No replies, sender info is hidden.
